data.title: Re: RDi 9.5 "not responding"
data.meta_description: Re:  RDi 9.5 "not responding" -- Mike, Gee, I thought RDI & SEU handled member locks... 1.) Open the member in RDI for EDIT 2.) Open the SAME MEMBER in SEU for EDIT It now allows this???? <shock!> When I try to save it RDI, I get this message: CPF3156E ("...in use") 1.) Close SEU 2.) Save source in RDI 3.) try to reopen source edit mode in SEU, I get this: EDT0221 - "...in use." I did not get any "Not Responding", not even for a split-second. I was working on source file, and edit the source, and had already saved it. I have turned back on...
